mapper.select: set @location = POINT(#{longitude}, #{latitude}); select p.createdAt, p.postIdx, u.userIdx, u.identification, u.nickname, u.profileImage, group_concat(pi.image) postImageList, p.location, p.content,group_concat(h.hashtagWord) as hashtagList, (case when st_distance_sphere(@location, POINT(p.longitude, p.latitude)) < 1000 then concat(format(st_distance_sphere(@location, POINT(p.longitude, p.latitude)), 2), 'm') else concat(format(st_distance_sphere(@location, POINT(p.longitude, p.latitude)) * 0.001 , 2), 'km') end) as distance, (select count(*) from PostLike pl where p.postIdx = pl.postIdx and pl.status = 'Y') as likes, (case (select count(*) from PostLike pl where pl.userIdx = #{userIdx} and pl.status = 'Y' and pl.postIdx = p.postIdx) when 1 then 1 else 0 end) as isliked, (case y.bookmark when 1 then 1 else 0 end) as isBookmarked from Post p join UserInfo u on p.userIdx = u.userIdx join PostImage pi on p.postIdx = pi.postIdx left join (select count(*) bookmark, b.postIdx from Bookmark b where b.userIdx = #{userIdx} and b.status = 'Y' ) y on y.postIdx = p.postIdx left join Hashtag h on p.postIdx = h.postIdx where st_distance_sphere(@location, POINT(p.longitude, p.latitude)) < #{distance} and p.status = 'Y' group by p.postIdx order by st_distance_sphere(@location, POINT(p.longitude, p.latitude)), 1 DESC;

mapper.select: set @location = POINT(#{longitude}, #{latitude}); select ui.userIdx, ui.nickname,ui.identification, ui.profileImage, p.postIdx, p.location, p.content,group_concat(h.hashtagWord) as hashtagList, (case when st_distance_sphere(@location, POINT(p.longitude, p.latitude)) < 1000 then concat(format(st_distance_sphere(@location, POINT(p.longitude, p.latitude)), 2), 'm') else concat(format(st_distance_sphere(@location, POINT(p.longitude, p.latitude)) * 0.001 , 2), 'km') end) as distance, group_concat(pi.image) postImageList, (select count(*) from PostLike pl where pl.postIdx = p.postIdx) as likes, (case (select count(*) from PostLike pl where pl.postIdx = p.postIdx and pl.userIdx = ui.userIdx) when 1 then 1 else 0 end ) as isLiked, (case (select count(*) from Bookmark bm where bm.postIdx = p.postIdx and bm.userIdx = ui.userIdx) when 1 then 1 else 0 end ) as isBookmarked from Follow f join UserInfo ui on ui.userIdx = f.userIdx join Post p on ui.userIdx = p.userIdx left join PostImage pi on p.postIdx = pi.postIdx left join Hashtag h on p.postIdx = h.postIdx where f.followingIdx = #{userIdx} and p.status = 'Y' group by p.postIdx order by p.createdAt desc ;
